entities.name: horace slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is introduced as an old friend and colleague of Dumbledore's. He is described as having a shrewd expression.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced by Dumbledore to Professor Slughorn. Harry has a lightning-shaped scar on his forehead.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore introduces Harry Potter to Professor Slughorn and tries to persuade him to do something.
